1152.name: DUR 12
1152.Applications: Steam-valves, high temperature liquid pumps, hot cutting tools, cutting tools for plastic, wood and paper as well as high stressed sealings and sliding surfaces.
1152.Suitable_For: 46-48 HRc, stellite 12 alloy with high temperature and abrasion resistance, thermo shock resistant and impact resistant, hardfacing valves, seats, pumps, knives, plastic recycling crushers etc.
